## IntentSynthesisResult interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Result of synthesizing an intent expression from a pattern rule.

Includes a confidence score indicating how natural the resulting intent expression is.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IntentSynthesisResult 
```
